item.title: Zelenskyy suggests Trump fly to Ukraine to help 'end the war'
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy on Tuesday suggested that U.S. President Trump should visit Ukraine, amid the latest U.S.-led push for a peace...

item.title: WATCH: Ohio officers save man from burning car in daring rescue
item.description: Officers in Ohio raced to save a man trapped inside a burning car, who was badly injured and couldn't move.

item.title: Body located amid search for missing Texas teen: Sheriff
item.description: While searching an area Tuesday afternoon, authorities found a body approximately 100 yards from Camilla Mendoza Olmos' home, an official said.
